page.title: 11Morwenstow - Societies
page.content: The block has eleven different clubs, teams and societies. The long established Men's and Women's Institutes incorporate a women's skittles team and the men's skittles and snooker teams. There are four other sporting clubs;- the football club,darts teams,male and female, a badminton club, and the new- est arrival, a short mat bowling club. The Morwenstow Society was formed to study local history and 'to preserve the past and present for the future'. There is also a Cornish Dancing Club named Myrghes Morwenna, which is Cornish for 'Maids of Morwenstow', so named because it is difficult to get any of the local men to join in. There is very little for youngsters and teenagers; if they want to join the cubs or brownies,for instance,they must travel outside the area.
